A Gateway To Global Opportunities

We provide unique life-changing career opportunities.
With prolonged years of experience our extensive recruitment experts will help you find the best jobs across the world in a transparent way.

Job Opening

Making Global Pathways

We believe in long-term relationship
We are committed to providing the best manpower solutions across the world. Our unique service model will help you identify the best talent for diverse sectors at various levels in your organization.

Filtering The Best Workforce

ODEPC does an intensive screening test before they present to the partner recruiting company the best candidates. This is ensured by an efficient expert panel system.

Become a Partner

Making Global Pathways

For the last 3 decades, ODEPC travel division is acting as a best friend for the overseas job seeker by setting them ready to fly with the timely arrangement of travelling papers and tickets.

Explore our services

Why ODEPC

  • A Government of Kerala initiative working under the State Labour Department
  • First of its kind in the country
  • Over 4 decades of experience and expertise
  • Tailor-made data bank of suitable candidates
  • Approved and appreciated by international countries and communities
  • Ushered in quality, reliability and professionalism in manpower recruitment
  • Thousands of satisfied clients and employees
  • Transparency and reliability
  • Professional and friendly service
  • Nominal service charge as per emigration rules
  • No service charge for certain categories
  • Trusted by both employers and employees
  • Travel assistance for overseas candidates
